data.name: Grass Cutters Academy - Steampunk Cursor
data.detailed_description:
This DLC will unlock the Steampunk Cursor from the start of the game

Provides the following benefits:

★ Steampunk Cursor


*The Steampunk Cursor can be unlocked in game for 250,000 upgrade points

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 and Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atom™ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB Graphics
  • Sound Card: One that sounds nice!
